name: Pitufo Lombardo
description: '''Eduardo Pedro Lombardo''' (born 13 March 1966), nicknamed '''Ed√∫''' and '''Pitufo''' ([[The Smurfs|Smurf]]), is a [[Uruguay]]an musician, composer, and singer. He stood out as a teenager as a member of several [[murga]]s in his country, in addition to accompanying renowned artists as a percussionist. Since 2007 he has developed a distinguished career as a soloist.
